mapinfo.detailsText:
In this narrow scope, players must try to control their map side to gain access to resources. Due to the middle oasis the player with the superior skirmisher count will be heavily favored in this narrow chokepoint. This map features two independent trading post lines on the outskirts of the map. 
 
 Native Civs: None 
 Outlaws: Pistolero / Comanchero 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
